amendment.description: To require annual reports on the expanded use of unmanned aerial vehicles in the national airspace system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4451 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4451 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S6377-6392) To require annual reports on the expanded use of unmanned aerial vehicles in the national airspace system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4451 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4451 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici.
